title: Understanding PivotCharts
text: A PivotChart is a visual representation of data from a PivotTable. It helps in analyzing and presenting data in a graphical format.

title: Default Chart Type
text: When you create a PivotChart, Excel automatically selects a default chart type. This type is commonly used for comparing values across categories.

title: Identify the Default Chart Type
text: Think about the most common chart type used for comparing different categories of data.
choices: Excel automatically finds a chart type based on the data entered
